info_start:
[info] your messege will be told to my master.
after /say you can talk to me.
by using /done to end conversation.
receipt_user_sent: [receipt] your messege have been told to my master.
error_reply_notarget: [error] you need to point one messege.
error_reply_nodata: [error] no data of the messege you point, cannot run related directive.
error_reply_notsupporttype: [error] not support type to reply messege.
error_receipt_blockedbyuser: [error] cannot reply due to the user block the bot.
error_receipt_unknown: [error] cannot reply due to unknown error.
warning_conversation_start: [warning] to start conversation, you need to run /say directive first.
warning_conversation_end: [warning] to run other bot functions, you need to run /done to end conversation first.
notify_conversation_start: [notify] you can talk to me now.
operation_block: [operation] the user you point is blocked now.
operation_unblock: [operation] the user you point is unblocked now.
warning_user_blocked: [warning] you're blocked now, cannot run any directive.
warning_user_adminonly: [warning] this directive is only available for my master.
